summary: Dr. Edward J. Arrison, an anesthesiologist, was disciplined for practicing medicine while under the influence of alcohol on July 2, 2020, and for making false statements on his 2020 license renewal application regarding his impairment status. This incident followed previous disciplinary actions for habitual intoxication and unprofessional conduct. His license is suspended for a minimum of one year, he must enroll in the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program (MPRP), and pay a $10,000 civil fine.
